about_the_game:
Many have heard the joke about the chicken getting to the other side of the street. Wouldn't you like to find out exactly how the chicken mentioned actually accomplished this goal? Find out in this modern spin on familiar arcade games of the past. Run and jump through six large levels that will test your reflexes and your patience. Many who have played this game have failed to reach the end due to frustration with it's clever level design, Will your playthrough be different? Find out if you dare!

Features:
- Carefully navigate through 6 large levels that are tough as nails!
- Colourful and stylized graphics everywhere you look
- Tight controls and clear user interface
- Funny and unique soundtrack and sound effects

name: Getting To The Other Side!!!

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Getting To The Other Side!! - $14.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Getting To The Other Side!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Can be run on Integrated Graphics, just lower the settings to "Low" and lower the resolution and resolution scale to your preference.
  • Additional Notes: Recommendation for running at 720p, 60 frames per second at low/medium settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200U
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Requires Unreal Engine Prerequisites and Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable.
  • Additional Notes: Recommendation for running at 1080p, 60 frames per second at high settings.

short_description: A modern spin on the classic arcade game. Play the only game that allows the player to run around as a crazy chicken! Complete each level and try to reach the end if you dare!
